CustomField.description: This field will be populated with a link to a public site when the "Available for external sharing" checkbox is checked
CustomField.formula: IF( TASKRAY__trAvailableExternal__c , HYPERLINK( $Setup.TASKRAY__trGlobalSettings__c.TASKRAY__trPublicSiteURL__c +'?pid='+ Id +'&fullScreen=true&view=planning', $Setup.TASKRAY__trGlobalSettings__c.TASKRAY__trPublicSiteURL__c +'?pid='+ Id +'&fullScreen=true&view=planning'), null)
CustomField.label: External Sharing Link
